Name: Realization
Description: Sephira, having mended her ways, has joined the reconstruction project, but you can't shake the feeling she might still hold some bitterness inside. So, you decide to check on her, just to be sure…
QuestDesc: Sephira, having mended her ways, has joined the reconstruction project, but you can't shake the feeling she might still hold some bitterness inside. So, you decide to check on her, just to be sure…

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Though Sephira agreed to help with the reconstruction, she still holds a grudge against the project. Better to check on her.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Sephira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't you dare pull something like that again, Pakal!

Dialogues.Speaker: Pakal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You're the last person who gets to say that, Sephira!

Dialogues.Speaker: Sephira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: He's been an Outcast for years! And now he sneaks back to steal Exoswarm materials while everyone's busy rebuilding the Observatory!

Dialogues.Speaker: Pakal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Look who's talking! You of all people, Sephira.

Dialogues.Speaker: Pakal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Come on, everyone! Let's take them down!

Dialogues.Speaker: Sephira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ambush, huh? Don't fool yourself. I heard {PlayerName} already taught your lot a proper lesson. Not a chance they'll come to help you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Pakal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Damn you, Sephira! You were one of us!

Dialogues.Speaker: Pakal
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And now you slink back to the village, get forgiven, and act like you're better than us? Disgusting!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (…So that's why she knew how to handle Outcast weapons.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Sephira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: …Yeah, I did something stupid. Unforgivable, really. And I even set back the reconstruction recently.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sephira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But Dhalifa talked sense into me, just like she always does. I finally understood how wrong I was.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sephira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've been trying to help with the reconstruction, to actually do something meaningful. And just like Dhalifa said, I can feel myself changing. I won't go back to hurting others for my own gain.

Dialogues.Speaker: Sephira
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you're willing to change too… the village will welcome you back someday.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But you'll have to face consequences first, just like the others did. I'll speak with the Spacetrek Collective and the Solisylum about this.
